lead_paragraph: Second-seeded Daniela Hantuchova saved a match point against Nicole Vaidisova to win, 2-6, 6-2, 7-6 (3), and advance to the final of the Generali Ladies in Linz, Austria. She will face Patty Schnyder, who defeated the Wimbledon runner-up Marion Bartoli 7-6 (5), 6-3.
